description.name: verseerc20
description.tagline: Verse erc20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto erc20-verse Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept Verse erc20 directly on your website
Unique erc20/verse receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your erc20/verse wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
